scripts.build-deployment: rm -rf deployment && mkdir deployment && yarn build-units && yarn && yarn build-bump-version && yarn build-relay && yarn build-server && yarn build-webpack
scripts.build-server: export NODE_ENV=production && rm -rf deployment/* && rsync -avm --exclude='*.js' --exclude='*.jsx' units ./deployment/ && ./node_modules/.bin/babel -s true --retain-lines -d ./deployment/units/ ./units && cp ./package.json ./deployment && cp ./yarn.lock ./deployment
scripts.dev-reset: watchman watch-del-all &&  rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && rm -rf ~/.node-gyp  && (cd units && find . -type d -name '__generated__' | xargs rm -r)
